questions.question: What is the Fake FBI Warning Screen?

questions.question: Is this real?

questions.question: Is it safe to use?
questions.answer: Absolutely. It runs entirely in your web browser and doesn't access or modify your computer in any way.

questions.question: Can I use it in my video or stream?
questions.answer: Yes! Many content creators use it as a retro intro, transition scene, or visual meme.

questions.question: How do I make it look realistic?
questions.answer: Go full screen, dim your lights, and play it before your video starts â€” it'll feel just like the real thing.
